message: Let's start fair. I'm happy to take a bit less to ensure we both get something.
I appreciate your fairness, but I think we can both do better. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking the larger share this round. We can alternate who gets the bigger share in future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think a 55/45 split is fairer considering the inflation.  We can keep alternating who gets the larger share, if you prefer.
Let's be reasonable and split the money evenly this time. We can both get a fair share, and we'll have more to work with in the future rounds.
